sourcesContent:
<template lang="">
  <v-container>
    <v-row>
      <v-col>
        <v-card>
          <v-form
            ref="form"
            @submit.prevent="submitForm"
            class="pa-5"
            enctype="multipart/form-data"
          >
            <v-text-field
              v-model="products.title"
              label="title"
              :rules="rules"
            ></v-text-field>
            <v-text-field
              v-model="products.category"
              label="category"
              :rules="rules"
            ></v-text-field>
            <v-text-field
              v-model="products.content"
              label="content"
              :rules="rules"
            ></v-text-field>
            <v-file-input label="select image" @change="selectFile" :rules="rules"></v-file-input>
            <v-btn type="submit"  color="primary"
              >add</v-btn
            >
          </v-form>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>
<script>
import axios from "axios";
import API from "../api";
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      rules: [(value) => !!value || "this field is requied"],
      products: {
        title: "",
        category: "",
        content: "",
        image: "",
      },
      image: "",
    };
  },
  methods: {
    selectFile(event) {
      console.log(event);
      this.image = file[0];

      // console.log( file.target.files[0].name);
    },
    async submitForm() {
      const formData = new FormData();
      formData.append("image", this.image);
      formData.append("title", this.products.title);
      formData.append("category", this.products.category);
      formData.append("content", this.products.content);
      // console.log(this.image);
      if (this.$refs.form.validate()) {
        const res = await axios.post(
          "http://localhost:5000/api/post/",
          formData
        );
        this.$route.push({ name: "home", params: { message: res.message } });
      }
    },
  },
};
</script>
<style lang=""></style>
